resources.string: 1. Number of Person in your Family
The Total CO₂ produced by my family in a year is
Number of Mango trees age>10 years required to support my family for one year to make our Emission ZERO is
(Swipe from Left end to Right for Navigation screen)
Family CO₂ Footprint will help you to estimate your family CO₂ emission per year.
Number of person in your house describes about the CO₂ produced by human breathing, which accounts for nearly 1kg of CO₂ per day per person.
Considering petrol(driving fuel), a litre of this fuel runs for 12–15 km.And presently the cost per litre is nearly 101 Rs. By average, 2.3 kg of CO₂ emission is produced per litre of petrol.
Presently the electricity power rate is Rs 7/kWh(Rs 7 per unit).Indirectly 0.92 kg of CO₂ is produced per 1kWh of electricity power.
BWSSB present water charge is Rs 11 per kilolitre. Energy intensity of urban water supply is 0.29kWh/m³ .
Weight of an average household LPG cylinder is 23.2 kg. 1 kg of LPG will emit approximately 1.662 kg of CO₂.
